column1: Digital Marketing and Data Analytics MSc
column5: Study online and gain an innovative degree delivered in partnership with an industry leading digital marketing agency, Mediaworks.Give yourself a competitive edge in the increasingly digital led marketing industry. Discover how digitally focused marketing strategies can integrate with more traditional techniques. Learn to use these strategies to attract new customers, build loyalty and meet consumer needs.Please note: This course is taught entirely online. While this would be a great course choice for international students, international students will not be eligible for a student visa as there is no requirement to enter the UK for study
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
